name: refrigerate
caption: Refrigerate

effect.short: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:ice} moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
effect.full: Turns the bearer's []{type:normal}-type moves into []{type:ice}-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

flavorText:
Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
